response.summary:
I am a Chemical Engineer with over 7 years of experience in design and development of alcoholic and non-alcoholic, full and reduced sugar, with knowledge in emulsion development and great skills as a sensory panelist.

Throughout my experience, I have worked with application and creation areas, working together with the commercial and marketing area, to provide a more accurate response to the projects and technical support to customer in formulation, development, and scaling of products, where my innovative and achievement-oriented approach has allowed me to offer alternatives and solutions. Also had worked with clients in the Caribbean, Andean, and Central region, which has allowed me to understand consumer insights in many countries

Additionally, I am a proactive, responsible, and charismatic person, with the ability to adapt easily to change. I am interested in learning continuously and growing professionally.
response.skills: Innovation Development, Food Engineering, Product Specification, Excel Formulas, Prototyping, Data Analysis, Problem Solving, Project Management, Technical Understanding, Project Implementation, Customer Service, Customer Experience, Fragrance, Flavors, Consumer Insight, Homologation, Raw Materials, Food Science, Research and Development (R&D), Flavor Chemistry

profile_positions.description:
-	Design and development of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages with the flavors and technologies (Sweetness and modulation) from the company.
-       Design and development of emulsions
-	Technical support in formulation and flavoring to clients in the Caribbean, Andean, and Central region.
-	Working together with the marketing and sensory commercial area to generate innovative and value-added proposals for clients.
-	Provide technical support to the customers and to sales force.
profile_positions.title: Application Specialist

profile_positions.description:
-	Design and development of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages with the flavors and technologies (Sweetness and modulation) from the company.
-	Technical support in formulation to application area.
-	Provide technical support to the customers and to sales force.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technician

profile_positions.description:
-	Assist in the process of formulating liquid and powders flavors
-	Support in the development and elaboration of application bases (Beverages, dairy products, snacks, bakery) and application of flavors.
-	Respond to projects that require portfolio samples suggestions.
-	Creation and maintenance of the first portfolio of the company.
-       Making flavour mixtures for the creation of new profiles.
-       Design and apply descriptive, discriminative and affective sensory tests for the R&D process and portfolio maintenance.
-       Process sensory test data and perform reports.
-	Support the product escalation process.
-	Technical advice to customers and account executives.
-	Verify the stability of the flavors formulated.
-	Enlistment of samples according to commercial requirements.
-	Organization and management of the database of raw materials and library of flavors.
profile_positions.title: Flavourist Assistant

profile_positions.description:
-	Visit customers to identify business opportunities y provide technical advice in the application of flavors and fragrances, formulations and product development.
-	Responsible for product research and development in the flavors area, developing applications for customer presentations.
-	Monitor progress of projects with customers and maintaining customer database.
-	Continuous search for new clients.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive and Applications Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-	Responsible for the formulation and development of products for the Flavors unit (beverages, sweet goods, bakery, savory, dairy) and the fragrances unit.
-	Direct work with the food industry in the region Coast and Santanderes; carrying out technical assistance for the development of new products according to customer needs.
-	Development of new flavor and fragrance profiles using existing flavors and fragrances. Monitor their production.
-	Design sensory tests and apply them to the internal panel and customers.
-	Teamwork with the commercial team giving advice and technical support, seeking to create initiatives that generate value for the company and for customers
-	Visit customers with the commercial area to identify business opportunities and provide technical assistance on formulations, development and product scaling 
-	Carrying out technical trainings for company staff.
-	Conducting quality control testing on flavors and fragrances: check the status of stored products, and making organoleptic and physicochemical evaluations to reply to the claims.
profile_positions.title: Flavor and Fragrance Applications Engineer

profile_positions.description: Care and maintenance of the Simulation Room of the Department of Chemical and Environmental Engineering of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante auxiliar

profile_positions.description: Teaching in the area of chemistry preparing students in the schools and in personalized home classes for the Saber 11 tests and the Universidad Nacional de Colombia's admission exam.
profile_positions.title: Docente de química

profile_positions.description:
-	Assist in the process of application of flavors, development and formulation of sweet goods, bakery and dairy products for the Andean, Central America and Caribbean region.
-	Purchase and keep a control of raw materials from the laboratory. Contact and negotiate with old and new suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Sweet Goods and Dairy Applications Laboratory Trainee.

company.name: Asociación Colombiana para el Avance de la Ciencia

profile_positions.company: Asociación Colombiana para el Avance de la Ciencia
profile_positions.description:
- Organization of association´s documents.
- Calling schools and companies to invited them to conferences related to scientific research.
profile_positions.title: Pasante cientifico

company.name: dsm-firmenich
company.description:
We are dsm-firmenich – innovators in nutrition, health, and beauty. We bring progress to life by combining the essential, the desirable, and the sustainable. 

From our master perfumers and flavorists to our expert nutritionists and scientists, our trailblazing teams work closely with customers, supporting their ambitions with 150+ years of R&D expertise.   

With a passionate and talented team of close to 30,000 employees, we are determined to be a force for good. And to work together to positively impact people and planet.  

#webringprogresstolife
